Name: splenic marginal zone lymphoma
Definition: A marginal zone B-cell lymphocyte located_in the spleen comprised of B-cells in place of white pulp.

Name: MALT lymphoma
Definition: A marginal zone B-cell lymphoma that has_material_basis_in mucosal tissue involved in antibody production.

Name: nodal marginal zone lymphoma
Definition: A marginal zone B-cell lymphoma  which morphologically resembles lymph nodes involved by marginal zone lymphomas of extranodal or splenic types
Synonym: Primary mediastinal clear cell lymphoma of B-cell type
